tossup_question: 13) MATH  There are 20 different colored marbles in a bag. 5 are green, 6 are blue, 2 are white, and 7 are black. What is the probability that you will pick a black marble?
bonus_question: 13) MATH  You have a set of numbers with standard deviation of A. If you add a constant K each of the numbers in the set, what would the new standard deviation be?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) K + A
X) K – A
Y) K x A
Z) A
